        public final void recordSession​(java.lang.String path)

      • repaint

        protected final void repaint()
        Call this method if the canvas is out of date and needs to be repainted. This will cause method paint(Graphics) to be called after the current call of method handleMouseEvent or handleKeyEvent finishes.

      • paint

        protected void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Called to allow you to paint on the canvas.

        You should not use the Graphics object after you return from this method.

        Parameters:
        g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.

      • handleMouseEvent

        protected void handleMouseEvent​(int id,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int clickCount)
        Called when the user presses (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED), releases (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED), or drags (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED) the mouse.
        Parameters:
        id - event id
        x - event x coordinate
        y - event y coordinate
        clickCount - amount of event clicks

      • handleKeyEvent

        protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id,
                              int keyCode,
                              char keyChar,
                              boolean isControlDown,
                              boolean isShiftDown)
        Called when the user presses a key (id == KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED) or enters a character (id == KeyEvent.KEY_TYPED).
        Parameters:
        id - event id
        keyCode - event key code
        keyChar - event key char
        isControlDown - CTRL is held down
        isShiftDown - SHIFT is held down

        protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id,
                              int keyCode,
                              char keyChar)

        public final void show()
